channel.title: How do I bring my server up using No-IP AND
channel.description:
It won't bring my client up. It says invalidhost. I know I have to go to client.java, client2.java and Applet_Sub1.java. But what do I put in those files and where? I know that will help bring client up. How do I host on No-IP once I have changed the IP thing? I've already gotten No-IP DUC downloaded and installed. It's running. I just want to know how to get my server online. I've already checked in all the databases for the site and all I can find is how to set your computer up for a Private Server. Not really how to get the client and server going...
Thanks

item.title: How do I bring my server up using No-IP AND
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Sorry then, I have no idea about all that new 508+ client stuff :mad:
One person who would know would probably be Davidi2, send him a PM

Read full topic

item.title: How do I bring my server up using No-IP AND
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Would you mind explaining a bit more on what happens when you bring up the client?

If you mean you need to change the IP then you could find that in gui.java, egui.java or client.java, search for “127.0.0.1” or “localhost”

I didn’t fully understand your post.

Read full topic
